column6: The Gauntlet, the Initiative's top drill instructor, has been beaten and left for dead. And all the evidence points towards his attacker being someone on the base. Who did it? A spy? A recruit? An instructor?
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller (cover):Stefano Caselli | writer:Dan Slott | inker:Steve Uy
